title: League of Legends in game Hud (something to do with my graphics card maybe)

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
when i recently got my new graphics card, i noticed that i got this new "hud" (top left corner in the picture). i dont know how to remove it. sometimes it even moves positions and moves to the top right corner or even the bottom right and it covers my map. my graphics card is a Strix gaming graphics card geforce gtx 1070 (https://www.memoryexpress.com/Products/MX62814). if anyone knows how to remove this hmu in the comments below, in league of legends (Solemn Kaizer) or on Discord @Solemn Kaizer#4763

-Thanks, Solemn Kaizer

replies.body: This might be another app creating an overlay in the background, like an Nvidia overlay.  See if this [guide ](http://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/4228/~/how-to-disable-the-geforce-experience-share-in-game-overlay)might help disable that!  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vA4QZvl8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-22T20:54:32.281+0000)
>
> This might be another app creating an overlay in the background, like an Nvidia overlay.  See if this [guide ](http://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/4228/~/how-to-disable-the-geforce-experience-share-in-game-overlay)might help disable that!  I hope that helps!

that didnt work, i already had everything the way it was. do you know wut im talking about tho??
